alert.note: Alert for Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 7:43PM CDT until September 17 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in north central Kansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Linn, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storms has a history of producing 60 mph winds. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenleaf and Barnes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
